title: Bugfixing
body: This is a known bug where I am unable to comment because my level is not updating (this maybe fixes it)

replies.body: Your profile was likely just out of sync!  You can always use the [syncing tool ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool)to help.  :D
